name: Vlad & Niki: Music Band
description:
Become a true music star directing the bands and friendly musicians! An excellent music game for fans of Vlad and Niki.

Main features:
- You will get into the world of music with famous characters
- The game develops the left hemisphere of your brain, which is responsible for creativity and imagination, as well as attention, accuracy and fine motor skills.
- It composes sound patterns, generating fun rhythms with the animation of the friendly musicians.

Download the game and have fun!
